database_info.title: OPP-115 Privacy Practice Database for RAG-Enhanced Annotation
database_info.description: A structured, label-specific database of privacy practice background material for OPP-115 annotation pipeline
database_info.coverage: Complete coverage of OPP-115 privacy practice categories for policy annotation

categories_overview.label: First Party Collection/Use
categories_overview.description: Privacy practice describing data collection or data use by the company/organization owning the website or mobile app

categories_overview.label: Third Party Sharing/Collection
categories_overview.description: Privacy practice describing data sharing with third parties or data collection by third parties

categories_overview.label: User Choice/Control
categories_overview.description: Practice that describes general choices and control options available to users

categories_overview.label: User Access, Edit and Deletion
categories_overview.description: Privacy practice that allows users to access, edit or delete the data that the company/organization has about them

categories_overview.label: Data Retention
categories_overview.description: Privacy practice specifying the retention period for collected user information

categories_overview.label: Data Security
categories_overview.description: Practice that describes how users' information is secured and protected

categories_overview.label: Policy Change
categories_overview.description: The company/organization's practices concerning if and how users will be informed of changes to its privacy policy

categories_overview.label: Do Not Track
categories_overview.description: Practices that explain if and how Do Not Track signals (DNT) for online tracking and advertising are honored

categories_overview.label: International and Specific Audiences
categories_overview.description: Specific audiences mentioned in the company/organization's privacy policy for which special provisions may apply

database_structure.annotation_approach: OPP-115 focuses on identifying privacy practices within policy text rather than legal compliance requirements

usage_guidelines.rag_integration: This database is designed for integration with retrieval-augmented generation systems for OPP-115 privacy practice annotation
usage_guidelines.search_functionality: Entries can be searched by category label, description, or usage guidelines
usage_guidelines.annotation_focus: Focus on identifying specific privacy practices and their attributes rather than legal compliance
usage_guidelines.attribute_requirements: Each category has required and optional attributes that should be identified during annotation

annotation_scheme_background.origin: Privacy policy annotation scheme developed for analyzing privacy practices
annotation_scheme_background.scope: Covers 9 major categories of privacy practices found in privacy policies
annotation_scheme_background.applicability: Broadly applicable to privacy policies across different jurisdictions and industries
